name: wholesomely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that someone is morally good and physically healthy: He was wholesomely raised to work hard and respect his elders. The photograph showed a couple with their three wholesomely happy children.
in a way that produces good physical or mental health: He tries to feed his family cheaply and wholesomely. Nobody wants to dine on food so wholesomely high-fibre that it can't be properly digested.
More examplesFewer examplesHe remained wholesomely modest, even after successfully pursuing a career as a film star. Each episode of the show ended with a scene that showed the family wholesomely gathered around the dinner table.
